title: Vintage 50's 2BR House In Historic District
posting_body: Updated, vintage 1950 charmer located in the heart of Santa Clara's historic "Old Quad" district.
New roof and gutters.
Dual pane windows.
10' x 22' attached patio room off kitchen.
Gas log fireplace.
Maple wood flooring in kitchen and custom breakfast nook.
Tile in bathroom with stall shower and separate tub.
The front bedroom can be an ideal home office or study and includes original built-in wood wall shelving.
Updated air conditioning and heating system.
There is a separate, private, detached studio cottage in back of the house that is rented to a single adult.
No garage on site.
The 80' long and gated driveway has plenty of open parking.
Cottage tenant parks on street.
Separate laundry room with washer/dryer is attached to the cottage.
No smoking of any kind.
No dogs or cats.
Terms of Lease: 1-year lease.
1st month + last month + $2500 security deposit.
Tenant to obtain a renter's insurance policy ($130 annual cost) through landlord's carrier.
Timely payments of rent during 1st year guarantees no rent increases during 2nd & 3rd years, if applicable.
Lease is tenant-friendly.
Out-of-town, retired landlord needs answers to the 4 questions below before scheduling any tour.
Please do not reply without answers.
Estimated Annual Gross Income - Each Adult
Credit Score - Each Adult
Number of Adults + Number of Children
How Long At Present Employment + Present Residence - Each Adult
AVAILABLE IMMEDIATELY TO QUALIFIED TENANT(S).
PLEASE REPLY WITH ANSWERS.
Thank you very much.
